meanings.definition: To travel beyond or surpass in distance or duration.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys outtravelling to new places every summer.
meanings.sent2: The explorer is outtravelling to remote islands for his research.
meanings.sent3: The snail was outtravelling at its own pace, slowly but steadily.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were outtravelling to far-off galaxies while she slept.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner was outtravelling the competition with his speed.

meanings.definition: The act of traveling beyond or surpassing in distance or duration.
meanings.sent1: His outtravelling amazed everyone who followed his journey.
meanings.sent2: The outtravelling of the astronauts to the moon was a historic event.
meanings.sent3: The outtravelling of the tortoise in the race was unexpected and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The outtravelling of time seemed to slow down during the peaceful moment.
meanings.sent5: The outtravelling of the river through the canyon created a breathtaking view.
